DOC.brief_summary: To study the clinical efficacy of microfracture combined with lateral ligament repairment for cartilage lesions of talus through the comparison between microfracture with and without lateral ligament repairment.
DOC.brief_title: Microfracture Technique for Talar Articular Cartilage Lesions With or Without Lateral Ligament Repairment
DOC.criteria: Full thickness cartilage injury Age: > 40 years old or < 18 years old; BMI > 30; lesion > 4 cm2
